Generates a forestplot to visualize C-Index of different models

get_c_index_forestplot.Rd

From a list of models passed as parameters of the function extracts their C-Index value and generates a forestplot to compare their results.

Usage

get_c_index_forestplot(...)

Arguments

...

The list of models that will conform the forestplot. If they are passed as variables, the variable name is assigned as model name in the forestplot. But, If they are passed as named arguments the argument name is used in the forestplot

Value

A forestplot with the C-Index data of the list of models

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
get_c_index_forestplot(A = model1, B = model2, C = model3, D = model4)
get_c_index_forestplot(model1, model2, model3, model4)
} # }
